title: Drawing, "Studies: Love-in-a-mist", late 19th century
medium: Brush and watercolor on white paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 31
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting six stalks of the flower love-in-a-mist, in blue, violet, and red with green foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies: Love-in-a-mist", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Brush and watercolor on white paper. Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney. 1937-59-7.
